name: Flitedux Aviation Training (Pty) Ltd
about: Flitedux Aviation Training (Pty) Ltd is a South African company specializing in Safety & Emergency Procedures training for pilots, cabin crew, and ground staff. We offer comprehensive courses, including Cabin Crew Initial Training up to SACAA licensing, Safety & Emergency Procedures, Crew Resource Management (CRM), Aviation Medicine, and Dangerous Goods handling. Our training programs are designed to meet the highest industry standards, ensuring that our students are well-prepared for the demands of the aviation industry. With a focus on safety and compliance, Flitedux is committed to delivering high-quality training that enhances the skills and knowledge of aviation professionals. We are dedicated to providing exceptional training experiences that contribute to a safer and more efficient aviation environment.
